name: Lost in Transit (itch) (Zapfly1299)
description:
A game about running a lost and found kiosk on a train. Return visitors the correct items and try to keep ahead of the clock!

Credits:
Matthew Barrett (@MattBarrett1299) - Gameplay design and scripting
Kyle Taylor (@KyleTaylorGD) - Gameplay design and scripting
Alan Boyle - Gameplay design and scripting
Luna Woods - Gameplay design and scripting
Robyn McCord - Animation
Joe Johnson (@Joe_Johnson3D) - Environment art + tech art
Albie Sothcott (https://albion_sothcott.artstation.com/) - Character and environment art
AJ (https://soundcloud.com/pruned-face?p=a&c=1) - tunes
